snippet: An 18th-century Chinese vase that sold for a record-setting $83 million at auction in 2010 but never paid for has now been sold for less than half that amount, according to Bloomberg.
abstract: An 18th-century Chinese vase that sold for a record-setting $83 million at auction in 2010 but never paid for has now been sold for less than half that amount, according to Bloomberg.

headline.main: Chinese Vase Said to Sell for Less Than Half Its Record-Setting Price
